title: copy to CWindows
extract: Add Copy To / Move To to the Windows Explorer Right Click Menu. A hidden functionality in Windows allows you to right click on a file, select Copy To Folder or Move To Folder, and the move to box will pop up and let you choose a location to either copy or move the file or folder to.Jul 23, 2007
extract_html: Add Copy To / Move To to the Windows Explorer Right Click Menu. A hidden functionality in Windows allows you to right click on a file, select Copy To Folder or Move To Folder, and the move to box will pop up and let you choose a location to either copy or move the file or folder to.Jul 23, 2007
